response.overview: Brainy Baby is university studied and published in JOCAM Journal of Children and Media. Brainy Baby Animals takes your child on a safari adventure to learn about animals as near as their back yard and as far away as other countries. Join the adventure to a local zoo to discover new animals and their funny habits and habitats. Sing Old MacDonald's Farm and other singalongs with your child as they learn. Interactive DVD features live action and real children to help teach about real animals in familiar surroundings and on a safari to a real zoo. Real life images and real children enjoy the fun too on the zoo adventure to help make fast learning connections. DVD introduces Animal categories like Fins and Flippers, Beautiful Bugs, Wonderful Wings and a ToeTapping visit to Old MacDonald's Farm. Your child will hear lively music with a gentle, instructional voice describing what your child is seeing. Video uses the teach repeat review method throughout.
response.tagline: Brainy Baby Teach Your Child Animals: Apes to Zebra
response.title: Brainy Baby: Animals
